data.name: Consumer RabbitMQ
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="{{protocol}}://{{source}}{{querystring  query_params  extra_query_params}}&queue={{queue}}&addresses={{hostname}}:{{port}}{{sslProtocol}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
